Name: Reactivated
About the game: A drone activates in a dark spaceship. After booting procedure it follows its last assignment. Only to find out there are decisions to be made accompanied by consequences . About Reactivated is a first-person horror game in dark sci-fi settings. Players are to explore, survive and make decisions that will affect the outcome at the end.
